posts.post_content:
this guy is a card drawing machine in a merfolk deck with all of its creatues' tap abilities. you could even equip him with [paradise mantle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=paradise mantle) to ensure an extra card every turn. After you add in the bonus from the likes of [lord of atlantis](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=lord of atlantis) and [merrow reejerey](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=merrow reejerey), the body is nothing to scoff at either.
  
   
PS they look like hooves to me too
